name: BridgeBots Demo
description:
BridgeBots is a puzzle platformer where you control block-shaped robots in order to make bridges or stairways to antennas so that a BombBot can blow it up.

This alpha was made as part of an ongoing project to make a new game every month for the year of 2021 in order to flesh out my game dev skills. As such, it is very buggy and unpolished. Still, I hope you enjoy what I've done with it. A list of controls is included in the readme file. This game supports both keyboard and XBox controllers. Other controllers may work too.
